glosses: To become straight, to flatten, to become level
To get better from a bad state, to improve.
(for weather) To clear up, to become mild.
(for a sick) To get better, to recover.

etymology:
Inherited from Ottoman Turkish دوزلمك (düzelmek) from دوز (düz), equivalent to
düz (“straight, flat”) + -el (verb-forming suffix) + -mek.
